A1: The first staff meeting of the `` Poppy-2014 '' operation
RelatedSentence: According to the Drug - Control Agency , the meeting was chaired by the First Deputy Head of the Agency , the Head of Operations , Major - General Vaysiddin Azamatov .
According to him , Ministry of Interior , National Security Committee , and Customs Services representatives participated in the meeting .
